title: Foundational Legal Competency Microlearning Program

context.additional_context: Online supplementary learning to bridge foundational knowledge gaps for law degree program entrants. Learners, primarily pre-service or in-service teachers, need to acquire legal literacy applicable to science subject areas

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain 12 foundational legal terms and concepts within one week.
Learners can pass quizzes with an 80% or higher accuracy rate after each microlearning session.
Over 70% of learners rate their confidence in enrolling in advanced legal modules on a 5-point scale as 4 or higher after completing the course.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
